synopsis.text: Will the promise of a luxurious barbecue feast turn into a wild goose chase for the Nohara family? It seems so, as their peaceful evening takes an unexpected turn when a stranger implicates them in a series of crimes they didn't commit. With the police and yakuza hot on their heels, Shin-chan and his family must navigate through a web of mystery to clear their names. As they uncover the involvement of the enigmatic organization, Sweet Boys, the Noharas embark on a thrilling adventure to Atami in search of answers. Will they manage to evade their pursuers and enjoy their long-awaited barbecue, or will the Sweet Boys bring their family escapade to a bitter end? Join the Noharas on this hilarious and heartwarming journey to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
